data.description: an XS interface to thai word seg. library
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Thai word segmentation is a big problem of Thai lanaguage analysis.
    There are many researches on it. I've found a project in
    sourceforge(http://thaiwordseg.sourceforge.net/) release a C-library
    that work well. So I create a XS interface of it, and pack it to a
    module called String::Thai::Segmentation.
